sentences.english: In the run-up to the vote, the role of the United States and the international community became a subject of controversy.
sentences.chinese: 在決議新憲法草案前，美國與國際社會反應不一。

sentences.english: Draft is regulation of directiveness of a policy, put forward from macroscopical angle.
sentences.chinese: 草案是一個政策指導性規定，是從宏觀角度提出的。

sentences.english: Now, Pecos Bill could ride anything that ever was.
sentences.chinese: 現在，佩科斯條例草案將曾經有過騎不了。

sentences.english: NPC deputies will review the draft general provisions of civil law of China.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大代表將審議《民法通則草案》總則。

sentences.english: And the leitmotiv of the next step of the building protocol is 'on top and dry'.
sentences.chinese: 強調的下一步建築草案是‘在上面乾燥’。

sentences.english: What is in the early draft?
sentences.chinese: 前期草案的內容是什麼？

sentences.english: The Assembly adopted a draft strategy for the prevention and control of sexually transmitted infections (STIs).
sentences.chinese: 大會通過了預防和控制性傳播感染全球戰略草案。

sentences.english: Lin. And this is our Planning Department Manager, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 計劃部說在此階段拿出計劃草案是不可行的。

sentences.english: Developing protocols to better coordinate response operations in a third country.
sentences.chinese: 制定更好地在第三國協調應對行動的議定書草案。

sentences.english: A draft of the first basic profile was recently published.
sentences.chinese: 第一個基本概要文件的草案最近已發佈了。

sentences.english: Bill fell in the fire across the frying pan of hot water for washing the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 條例草案全面下跌油炸鍋的熱水清洗盤子在火中。

sentences.english: On Monday the negotiation process will begin with a draft resolution.
sentences.chinese: 星期一，談判進程將隨着擬定決議草案開始。

sentences.english: I called for the draft agreement you sent us one week ago.
sentences.chinese: 我打電話是關於你一週前寄來的那份協議草案。

sentences.english: So when Bill saw the windstorm, he got an idea.
sentences.chinese: 因此，當條例草案看到風暴，他得到了一個主意。

sentences.english: The communiqu did not release details of the amendment.
sentences.chinese: 但是報道沒有透露這份修改草案的細節。

sentences.english: Please examine the bill carefully and see if there's any mistake.
sentences.chinese: 條例草案，請予審議，並仔細查看是否有任何錯誤。

definition: proposal/draft resolution/motion (to be debated)/to propose a bill/to make a proposal
to make a draft/to draw up (plans)
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4
